Articles.Content: The contract says I need an antenna attached for completion. Being that the text is not specific and just says antenna, would it be safe to assume a relay antenna is acceptable? I figure if they are gonna make me put it in a stationary orbit then I might as well get some use out of it

Pretty sure any antenna is fine.  But you can check by launching it and, on the pad, checking the little contract pop-up window to see if that element of the contract is green.  If not, recover our revert and change out the part.

Thanks bud good tip

it considered it fulfilled with the array.
